record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JULY 30, 2007, at 2 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JULY 30, 2007, at 2 P.M. -- (Senate - July 26, 2007)

[Page: S10208]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business this morning, I wish everyone within hearing a good morning and ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:29 a.m., adjourned until Monday, July 30, 2007, at 2 p.m.
